IRenderMaterial

Defines a material that has its associated render element (as opposed to an IMaterialAttrib which only defines the attributes of the material).

Functions

virtual void SetShader(
IShader *pShader
) = 0

Sets shader to use for this material

Parameters

shader

Render
virtual void Render(
IGraphics *pGraphics,

) = 0
